title: The Herd-HOUR-1-LeBron James, Joe Burrow, other sports
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-1-LeBron James, Joe Burrow, other sports
description:
Colin discusses why LeBon James is the most powerful athlete in America, why he is impressed with Joe Burrow, and other sports following the lead of the NBA.

Guest: Shams Charania
